title: 怎么让一个玩家不被其他玩家看到
author: RainIFunS
txt_content: 如题，等于隐身，最好别用药水效果，大佬们救救我

replies.txt_content: 服务器OP好像可以直接隐身 名字都看不见

replies.author: Beam_less
replies.txt_content: op可以使用/v指令 (Essentials插件自带指令)

replies.author: Eldon
replies.txt_content:
Javadoc - Player.hidePlayer(Player player)

e.g.
Player target = Bukkit.getPlayer("Yamazaki");
Bukkit.getOnlinePlayers().forEach(p -> p.hidePlayer(target));复制代码

大概就这样，emmmmmm。

replies.author: ddyy163
